ROIPAC Module¶

This Python module contains tools for reading ROI_PAC format input data.

exception pyrate.roipac.RoipacException[source]¶

Convenience class for throwing exception

pyrate.roipac.manage_header(header_file, projection)[source]¶

Manage header files for ROI_PAC interferograms and DEM files. NB: projection = roipac.parse_header(dem_file)[ifc.PYRATE_DATUM]

Parameters:
  • header_file (str) – ROI_PAC *.rsc header file path
  • projection – Projection obtained from dem header.
Returns:

combined_header: Combined metadata dictionary
Return type:

dict
pyrate.roipac.parse_date(dstr)[source]¶

Parses ROI_PAC ‘yymmdd’ or ‘yymmdd-yymmdd’ format string to datetime.

Parameters:dstr (str) – ‘date’ or ‘date1-date2’ string
Returns:dstr: datetime string or tuple
Return type:str or tuple
pyrate.roipac.parse_header(hdr_file)[source]¶

Parses ROI_PAC header file metadata to a dictionary.

Parameters:hdr_file (str) – path to ROI_PAC *.rsc file
Returns:subset: subset of metadata
Return type:dict
